name: OR_LOG_ALL_SURG
description: The OR_LOG_ALL_SURG table contains OR management system log surgeons.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical log which refers to the surgeon.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the surgeon in this surgical log.

columns.name: SURG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgeon.

columns.name: ROLE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value which represents the role for the corresponding surgeon in the surgical log.

columns.name: SERVICE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value which represents the kind of service the surgical log falls under.

columns.name: START_TIME
columns.description: The start date and time for the surgeon in the surgical log.

columns.name: END_TIME
columns.description: The end date and time for the surgeon in the surgical log.

columns.name: TOTAL_LENGTH
columns.description: The total time a surgeon was needed in the surgical log in seconds.

columns.name: PANEL
columns.description: The panel number in the surgical log in which the surgeon was involved.

columns.name: RTLS_OFF_YN
columns.description: If set to Yes, Real Time Location System (RTLS) tracking has manually been turned off for this provider on this case log.

columns.name: TIME_SOURCE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The source (Manual / RTLS) and status category of this row's start and end time.

columns.name: START_TIME_CMT
columns.description: The start time comment for the surgeon in the surgical log.

columns.name: END_TIME_CMT
columns.description: The end time comment for the surgeon in the surgical log.

columns.name: START_TIME_DOCU_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the EMP user who documented the start time for each surgeon associated with any panel of the surgical log.

columns.name: START_TIME_DOCU_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: END_TIME_DOCU_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the EMP user who documented the end time for each surgeon associated with any panel of the surgical log.

columns.name: END_TIME_DOCU_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
